column2: new4 %<>% mutate(Host_species=recode(Host_species, "elk"= "Elk", "Foxes" = "Fox", "White-tailed Deer"="White-tailed deer", "dogs"="Dog", "Stray dogs"="Dog", " Impala antelope"="Impala", "\npolecat"="Polecat", "Humans"="Human", "Mule Deer"="Mule deer", "Marten"="Pine marten", "Kudu antelope "="Kudu"))

filter_host<-subset(new4, Host_species %nin% c("Mosquito?", "Human", "Bat", "Wild deer?", "Wild mammals", "Wild ruminants", "","?","Birds","Wild birds", "Domestic mammals", "Domestic ruminants", "Domestic small ruminants","Unknown", "Humans" ))
